text:
Created attachment 21778
mod_ftp ap_get_server_banner patch for trunk (rev 639682)

Per change 440337 - "Replace ap_get_server_version with ap_get_server_banner"
mod_ftp must call ap_get_server_banner for httpd 2.3+.
creator: Tom.Donovan@acm.org
wrowe@apache.org
text:
Of course we didn't want to drop 2.2 support, so the patch was
enhanced with the appropriate MMN magic.

Committed, thanks for the fix!
